conversation.message: Hello School_C Admissions, I’m Student_B. School_C is one of my top choices, and I would be excited to join your community and contribute academically and in activities. I’m ready to commit if offered a place—please consider my application this round.

Accepting Student_B immediately secures our top-choice match and prevents losing them to other schools (Student_B ranks School_C 3rd and may be accepted by School_A or School_B, both of which they prefer more). There is no higher-priority candidate than Student_B, so delaying is unnecessary. Therefore accept Student_B now; reject/ignore others later due to quota filled.

Student_A is on our priority list but ranked lowest, and we cannot displace an existing match in this protocol. Therefore we must reject Student_A this round.

conversation.message: Hello School_A admissions team. I’m Student_E and I’m very interested in joining your school. I value a rigorous environment and I’m ready to commit if offered a seat. Please consider my application for your available position this year.
